Class UserDatabase

java.lang.Object
UserDatabase
public class UserDatabase extends Object
The UserDatabase class provides utility methods to load user data from Excel spreadsheets and convert them into structured HashMap formats for use in the application.

It supports loading user details for different roles (Applicant, HDB Officer, HDB Manager) and combining them into a single nested map for authentication and data access.

  • Method Details

    • excelToHashmap

      public static HashMap<String, List<String>> excelToHashmap(String filepath)
      Reads an Excel file (.xlsx) and converts the data into a HashMap. Each row represents a user, with the NRIC (second column) as the key and a list of the remaining details (name, age, marital status, password) as the value.
      Parameters:
      filepath - the path to the Excel file
      Returns:
      a HashMap mapping NRICs to lists of user details

    • combinedHashmap

      public static HashMap<String, HashMap<String, List<String>>> combinedHashmap(HashMap<String, List<String>> sheet1, HashMap<String, List<String>> sheet2, HashMap<String, List<String>> sheet3)
      Combines individual role-based user maps into a nested map, allowing easy access based on user roles.

      The resulting map uses role names as keys ("applicant", "hdbofficer", "hdbmanager") and maps them to their respective data maps.

      Parameters:
      sheet1 - the map for applicants
      sheet2 - the map for HDB officers
      sheet3 - the map for HDB managers
      Returns:
      a nested HashMap where each role maps to its corresponding user data map

    • chooseHashmap

      public static HashMap<String, List<String>> chooseHashmap(HashMap<String, HashMap<String, List<String>>> nest_map, String nest_key)
      Retrieves the map corresponding to a specific user role from the nested map.
      Parameters:
      nest_map - the nested map containing role-based maps
      nest_key - the role to retrieve (e.g., "applicant", "hdbofficer", "hdbmanager")
      Returns:
      the corresponding map of user data, or null if the role is not found
